channel.title: Assets on Cute Exporter Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Assets on Cute Exporter Docs

item.title: Layers
item.description: Layers # Assets can have one or more children (Generically called layers). Layers are what get transformed and output into your texture atlas. Layer settings # Layers have a few settings that will affect how they are output. Layer Export # When you export your project, each active layer image is saved to the texture atlas and an entry for that layer is put in the output json file.
